bootstrapURLKeys.description: { key: '', language: 'en', region: 'en', libraries: ['places'], ...otherUrlParams, } If you want to include additional libraries to load with the maps api, indicate them in the libraries property of the bootstrapURLKeys object.

center.description: Can be set to [lat, lng] or { lat: lat, lng: lng}. A position object for the center.

debounced.description: Defaults to true. Whether map events are debounced.

defaultCenter.description: Can be set to [lat, lng] or { lat: lat, lng: lng}. A position object for the center.

heatmap.description: To use the heatmap layer, add visualization to the libraries property array on bootstrapURLKeys and provide the data & configuration for the heatmap in heatmap as props. If you have multiple maps in your project and require a heatmap layer in at least one of them, provide libraries:['visualization'] to all of them.

height.description: The height of the map block.

layerTypes.description: Examples ['TrafficLayer', 'TransitLayer']. The layer types to be included in the map.

markers.description: A list of Markers with defined properties.

resetBoundsOnResize.description: Default: false, When true this will reset the map bounds if the parent resizes.

style.description: Custom map css properties to apply to map block.

onClick.description: Trigger onClick actions when the map is clicked.

onClickMarker.description: Trigger onClick actions when a marker is clicked.

onDrag.description: Trigger onDrag actions when a map is dragged.

onDragEnd.description: Trigger onDragEnd actions when a map is finished being dragged.

onGoogleApiLoaded.description: Trigger onGoogleApiLoaded actions when the map api is loaded.

onMapTypeIdChange.description: Trigger onMapTypeIdChange actions when the map type is changed.

onTilesLoaded.description: Trigger onTilesLoaded actions when the map tiles are loaded.

onZoomAnimationStart.description: Trigger onZoomAnimationStart actions when the map is zoomed.

onZoomAnimationEnd.description: Trigger onZoomAnimationEnd actions after the map is zoomed.
